title: SUBVERSUM
author: SUBVERSUM
content: Hello, guys!My team are currently developing a metaverse named Subversum. The purpose of our game is to adress global ecology issues, help to solve them and educate society on how to run a business without bringing harm to environmentWe're presenting our game on the upcoming Blockchain Conference in Dubai on the 4th of October. If you'll be there, we're glad to meet with you and have a talk! And we'd love to hear your feedback about our project, here's a link to our website: https://subversum.space/Thank you in advance!
